name: backbone-tastypie
description: A small conversion layer to make [backbone.js](https://github.com/documentcloud/backbone) work together happily with [django-tastypie](https://github.com/toastdriven/django-tastypie). Other REST APIs conforming to the same style are also compatible. See for example [TastyMongo](https://github.com/ProgressiveCompany/TastyMongo).
